profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional full-stack development (Python, Django, web applications, code reviews, coaching junior developers) and business stakeholder collaboration. While it mentions integrating LLMs and staying updated on GenAI, these aspects appear to be secondary to the core software development responsibilities and do not demonstrate the deep specialization in generative models, prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning required for a GenAI Engineer. The role is more about building applications that *use* AI rather than developing or deeply customizing the AI models themselves, aligning more with a traditional software engineering role that incorporates AI components, or potentially an ambiguous role if the AI integration is not sufficiently detailed.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes developing end-to-end web applications using Python and Django, writing efficient, maintainable, and scalable code, performing code reviews, and adhering to coding standards and best practices. This directly aligns with traditional software engineering tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django

job_tasks.justification: The role involves coaching junior developers and sharing knowledge, which is a common aspect of senior software development roles focused on team growth and technical excellence.
job_tasks.phrase: het team te coachen op technische aspecten

job_tasks.justification: The job involves collaborating with data scientists and data engineers to integrate LLMs, which falls under the modeling category, specifically in the context of using pre-trained generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to stay updated on the latest developments in GenAI, LLM, and software development, and to provide new insights and recommendations, highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling

job_tasks.justification: The role involves guiding junior developers, sharing knowledge, and contributing to an innovative environment, which requires strong communication and collaborative skills.
job_tasks.phrase: begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring

job_tasks.justification: Performing code reviews and providing constructive feedback to maintain coding standards and best practices are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states working closely with stakeholders to understand needs, advise on technical solutions, and deliver high-quality software products on time and within budget, which is a key aspect of business understanding and alignment.
job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren

soft_skills.phrase: het team te coachen op technische aspecten
Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling
begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring
uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback

technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren
